mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "User" (department_id, emp_no, password, username, email, phone, role, profile_image) VALUES ( #{user.departmentId}, #{user.empNo}, #{user.password}, #{user.username}, #{user.email}, #{user.phone}, #{user.role}, #{user.profileImage} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "User" INNER JOIN Department ON Department.id = "User".department_id WHERE "User".id = #{userId}
